<script>
	 $(window).ready(function() {
	$('#form_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!}').simpleContactForm (
	{
	url : "{!-PHPRELPATH-!}/ew_contactform.php",
	type: "POST",  
	subject : "New message from your website",    
	clearAfterSend : true,	 			
	errorClass : "error",								
	success : function() {
	alert('{!-plcfSuccessMessage-!}');
	}
		
});

 });
</script>
